font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } .toolbar-background { background: transparent; border:none; } ion-navbar, .toolbar-background, ion-header { /* height: 15vh; min-height: inherit !important;*/ } .scroll-content, .fixed-content { } ng-component { /* background: #fff;*/ } ion-navbar { border: none; } ion-header { left: 24px; top: -15px; top:0; left:0; position: absolute; z-index: 10; display: block; width: 100%; background:transparent; } .toolbar-content { opacity: 0; } ion-icon { display: none; } .back-button .back-button-text { display: none!important; } .bar-button-menutoggle ion-icon, ion-icon.back-button-icon { display: inline-block; /*top: 1vh;*/ position: relative; } .bar-button-menutoggle ion-icon:before { height: 7vh; content: ''!important; background: url(https://app.ebenezeratl.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/11//navlink.png); width: 7vh; right: 5vw; background-size: cover; top: -.5vh; background-position: center; } button.bar-button-menutoggle { height: auto; position: absolute; bottom:2vh; right: 0; z-index:1000; } button.back-button{ position: absolute; bottom: 0vh; right: 0vh; z-index: 1000; } button.bar-button-menutoggle .button-inner, button.back-button .button-inner { height: 16vh; display:none; } ion-icon.back-button-icon:before { background: url(https://app.ebenezeratl.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/11//back-button.png); left: 5vw; top: -.5vh; width: 7vh; height: 7vh; content: ''!important; background-size: cover; background-position: center; } .menu-inner .item-inner { padding-right: 0!important; } .input-wrapper .label:before, .input-wrapper .label:after { content: none; } ion-header:after{ display:none; } button.activated .input-wrapper .label { color: #e19d29; } .input-wrapper .label { color: #fff; margin: 0; text-align: center; display: block; line-height: 4.5vh; font-size: 6.5vw; text-transform: uppercase; font-family: 'Conv_Gotham-Light'; } ion-content.content { height: 114vh; margin-top: -10vh; background: transparent!important; } .menu-inner ion-list .item, .menu-inner ion-list > .item:last-child, .menu-inner ion-list > .item-wrapper:last-child .item { border-bottom: none; box-shadow: none; } .menu-inner ion-list { margin-top: 16vh; } .menu-inner { width: 100%; background: rgba(0, 33, 87, 0.85) !important; background-position: center top!important; background-size: cover!important; } .bar-button::after{ left: -36px; right: 0px; top: 0px; bottom: -6px; position: absolute; content: ""; max-width: 29px; background: url(https://revshilohapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/lightblue-home.png); background-size: contain; background-repeat: no-repeat; height: 27px; } .menu-inner ion-list .item { border: none; padding-left: 0; background-color: transparent!important; min-height: auto; margin: 2.5vh 0; } .show-menu .menu-inner button.here-menu ion-label:after { content: "Get Acquainted"; display: block; } .ion-md-share { display: none!important; } button.search-button-header { display: none; } ion-menu .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none!important; } ion-menu .menu-inner .header{ display: none; } .page-ebenezer-atl-home-2 .giphy { width: 100%; position: absolute; top: 33vh; text-align: center; z-index: 1; animation: cssAnimationDisappear 0s 8s forwards; } .page-ebenezer-atl-home-2 .giphy img { width: 100%; max-width: 100px; margin: 0 auto; } .page-ebenezer-atl-home-2 div.cellular-instructions { color: #252525; position: absolute; display: block; font-size: 3vw; background: #eee; width: 100vw; left: 0; top: 40%; padding: 2vh 6vw 2.25vh; animation: cssAnimation 0s 8s forwards; visibility: hidden; z-index: 0; height: auto; } .page-ebenezer-atl-home-2 div.cellular-instructions li { font-size: 3vw; margin: .75vh 0; color: #252525; } .page-ebenezer-atl-home-2 div.cellular-instructions ol, .page-ebenezer-atl-home div.cellular-instructions ul { padding-left: 5vw; } .page-ebenezer-atl-home-2 iframe.ap3-iframe { z-index: 10; position: relative; } @keyframes cssAnimation { to { visibility: visible; } } @keyframes cssAnimationDisappear { to { visibility: hidden; } } /*iPhone 6, 7, 8*/ @media only screen and (device-width: 375px) and (device-height : 667px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) { h1.orange.center { padding: 6vh 1vw 2vh; } } /*iPhone X*/ @media only screen and (device-width : 375px) and (device-height : 812px) and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio : 3) { .bar-button-menutoggle ion-icon:before { height: 6vh; width: 6vh; } ion-icon.back-button-icon:before { width: 6vh; height: 6vh; } .article-box { padding-bottom: 8vh; } .landing-content { bottom: 5vh; } .menu-inner ion-list { padding-top: 2vh; } }
